Fantastic expereince.  Fun atmosphere with decor setting it apart from the norm.  Staff was very friendly, helped pick out dishes and very attentive to detail.  Started with the Burrata cheese, it is a must! By far best we ever had! For enttees we had the fresh, in house made, spaghetti with cherry tomatoes and fresh basil & tellagoti with pesto and basil.  Both were marvelous and bursting with flavor! For desert we had the truffles, excellent, and lemon creme pie, also excellent.  A must stop while in Barcelona. Our waiter was a nice guy from Italy with a terrific beard!
